website_summaries.verdict: This integrated seat and ladder system is perfect for kids who find it difficult to get onto the toilet using a regular step stool.
pros: Height-adjustable ladder with extra large grips makes climbing up fun and easy
Nonslip seat pads provide a secure and steady fit to the toilet while nonskid feet keep the base from sliding
Comfortable seat cushion is easily removed for cleaning
Assembles in minutes, no tools required
cons: Although it folds for storage, it still has a considerable footprint
